promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong gorilla fire-type pokemon wearing ornate armor. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lavaguard, a a massive strong gorilla fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Flare Tail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "fire" or "Lavaguard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, gorilla-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: This colossal simian dwells in molten landscapes, utilizing its Flare Tail to navigate lava flows with ease. Its warm embrace sparks forest rejuvenation.
